pullRequest.title: #93 - Added BytesAreString matcher
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #93
Added BytesAreString matcher that can be composed with RsHasBody matcher to check string bodies (including JSON given the right matchers)

nodes.bodyText: @olegmoz The class name doesn't sound right. How about AreBytesEqualTo or BytesEqualTo.
